commits.message:
A'ight boooooyz, it's happening again. Lets see if 3d times the charm for real.

Basically there's a shit ton of work that needs to happen to convert this over to ponyvillefm/ponyvillelive.
Priority #1 is gettings basic stream infromation and interaction working, then other things will come with time.

Lets see if I can actually do it this time.
few fixes
Removing traces of attempted config file

Worked on plugin idea some more, It now connects and plays again.

Still need to refine how plugins are handled and loaded (as isolated, individuals with own dependencies)
Change project structure to be modular. Everything is broken.

Made it more stable with the "new" backend
